name: AR Demo
description:
AR Demo

A short Star Wars themed augmented reality demo.

The player will have to aim with the mobile the image in the folder and tap the screen.

A project for the university developed with Vuforia and Unity3D.

Developed on 2017.

The Team

Clone Trooper Modeling  -  Oriol Caminal Miró
